resources.string: / Sustainable behaior needs to be (green) rewarded!
You are now contributing to limit food waste and a more sustainable IceMobile (world)!
Let Michiel and his companions know on a weekly basis when you attend lunch at Ice. This way Michiel can adjust the groceries and we all waste less food.
By correctly indicating your presence at lunch you can earn leafs.

● Confirm on Friday for the next week: +2 leafs
● Confirm before Monday 8:00 for the same week: +1 leaf 
● Cancel same day after 8:00: -1 leaf 
● No Confirmation at all: -1 leaf 
● Collect 20 Leafs and get rewarded with your own plant.
Collect 20 Leaves and\n get rewarded with\n your own plant.
